item.title: Best Books I read in 2020
item.description: Best books I read in 2020 Almanack of Naval Ravikant by Eric Jorgenson Easy to read and full of good quotes. I especially loved the parts about happiness. You might not even recognize that happiness is a valid goal in life. And it can have enormous impact on other aspects of your life. It’s free https://www.navalmanack.com. The best book I’ve ever read. Oxygen by Nick Lane A tremendous book that will change your perspective on cell biology and possibly make you think about how you can live your life to better protect your cells.
